name: Dog Watch (JokGames)
description:
Do you have what it takes to be a professional dog walker? It ain't no walk in the park.

Only gamepad supported.

Controls

  • Move around with left stick.
  • Hold one of the face buttons (X, Y, A, B on a xbox controller) to select the dog of the same color.
  • Press LT to pull the leash and calm the selected dog.

Alt + F4 to quit the game ;)
